debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, JPMorgan Chase & Co. had total debt of $258,952 million. The company's leverage ratio was 5.75x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: JPMorgan Chase & Co. reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 33.1%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
